alert.note: Alert for Grant; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 3:26PM CDT until September 06 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GRANT...EAST CENTRAL SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mabelvale, or over Southwest Little Rock, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... West Little Rock... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Otter Creek... Ironton... East End... Sweet Home... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... State Fairgrounds... Chenal Valley... Scott... Alexander... Cammack Village... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
